unknown.name: Unknown
unknown.details: Placeholder, used as a default/fallback value. This commands will be responded to with and error.

shutdown_system.name: Shutdown System
shutdown_system.details: Tells the flight runner to shutdown.

start_module.name: Start Module
start_module.details: Tells the flight runner to start a module given a 3 letter module identifier.

stop_module.name: Stop Module
stop_module.details: Tells the flight runner to stop a module given a 3 letter module identifier.

restart_module.name: Restart Module
restart_module.details: Tells the flight runner to restart a module given a 3 letter module identifier.

enter_launch_phase.name: Enter Launch Phase
enter_launch_phase.details: Tells the flight runner to enter launch phase, only works in pre-launch.

clear_all_errors.name: Clear All Errors
clear_all_errors.details: Clears all errors from the error frame

clear_specific_error.name: Clear a Specific Error
clear_specific_error.details: Clears a specific error/diagnostic code from the error frame given an error code (uint16_t) in hex.

send_num_active_errors.name: Send Number of Active Errors
send_num_active_errors.details: Sends the number of active errors in the error frame.

send_rssi.name: Send RSSI
send_rssi.details: Sends the RSSI value from the telemetry module.

send_snr.name: Send SNR
send_snr.details: Sends the SNR value from the telemetry module.

send_aprs_location.name: Send APRS Location
send_aprs_location.details: Sends the APRS location from the telemetry module.

add_pre_configured_extension.name: Add Pre-Configured Extension
add_pre_configured_extension.details: Adds a pre-configured extension to the configuration.
